amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund to improve payment accuracy for hospitals under the Medicare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 636 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 636 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S3698-3702; text: CR S3700) To establish a reserve fund to improve payment accuracy for hospitals under the Medicare program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 636 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 636 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
